snippet: The former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez pleaded not guilty to a first-degree murder charge Friday in the death of Odin Lloyd.
abstract: Former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez pleads not guilty to first-degree murder charge after his indictment in the killing of friend Odin Lloyd, who authorities say was shot five times; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez pleaded not guilty to a first-degree murder charge Friday in the death of Odin Lloyd.
